ch.aplu.xboxcontroller

Interface XboxControllerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XboxControllerAdapter

    public interface XboxControllerListener
    Declarations of notification methods called from the class XboxController.

    • Method Summary

      • dpad

        void dpad(int direction,
        boolean pressed)
        Notification when the direction pad is actuated. This pad has 8 possible positions returned by the direction parameter: 0->NORTH, 1->NORTHEAST, 2->EAST, 3->SOUTHEAST, 4->SOUTH, 5->SOUTHWEST, 6->WEST, 7->NORTHWEST
        Parameters:
        direction - one of the values 0..7
        pressed - true, when button is pressed; false, when released

      • leftTrigger

        void leftTrigger(double value)
        Notification when the LEFTTRIGGER value changes.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value 0..1

      • rightTrigger

        void rightTrigger(double value)
        Notification when the RIGHTTRIGGER value changes.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value 0..1

      • leftThumbMagnitude

        void leftThumbMagnitude(double magnitude)
        Notification when the magnitude of the left thumb changes.
        Parameters:
        magnitude - the new magnitude 0..1

      • leftThumbDirection

        void leftThumbDirection(double direction)
        Notification when the direction of the left thumb changes.
        Parameters:
        direction - the new direction 0..360 degrees (clockwise, 0 to north)

      • rightThumbMagnitude

        void rightThumbMagnitude(double magnitude)
        Notification when the magnitude of the rigth thumb changes.
        Parameters:
        magnitude - the new magnitude 0..1

      • rightThumbDirection

        void rightThumbDirection(double direction)
        Notification when the direction of the right thumb changes.
        Parameters:
        direction - the new direction 0..360 degrees (clockwise, 0 to north)

      • isConnected

        void isConnected(boolean connected)
        Notification when the connection to the controller is lost or reestablished.
        Parameters:
        connected - true, if the connection is reestablished; false, if lost
